You are eligible to get extra data benefits mentioned in JioPhone Diwali offer, for JioPhone taken using gift voucher.
A Wi-Fi call will be treated as a regular voice call.

In case you are getting a technical error 4 on your TV screen, you can follow the steps given below:
Step 1: Ensure you have an active plan subscription. You can check for your validity from 'My plans'. If the plan is expired, please recharge to continue uninterrupted services.
Step 2: Turn your set top box on & go to 'Refresh TV' section & place a refresh request.
Step 3: Your channel list will be updated in 15 minutes once you have raised the request. Enjoy Hathway services!
If you are still facing the same issue, you may contact your Area Supervisor or Local Service provider OR contact on our Helpline number from 6 AM to 12 midnight.
Note:- Please keep your STB on Stand-by mode, while making the payment.

In case you are getting a technical error 14 on your TV screen, you can follow the steps given below:
Step 1:Please check if the NDS Number mentioned on the Set Top Box and Number reflecting in Diagnostic Screen are same.
Step 2: Please follow the following process to check the NDS number from Diagnostics:
1. Press 'Menu' on Hathway remote
2. Press the red button on the remote
3. Select 'System Setup'
4. Enter the password if you have set any or else put the default password '0000'
5. Select 'Diagnostics' & scroll till you can find 'NDS number'
If you are still facing the same issue, you may contact your Area Supervisor OR Local Service provider to get NDS details OR contact on our Helpline number from 6 AM to 12 midnight.

In case you are getting a technical error 2,6 or 11 on your TV screen, you can follow the steps given below:
Step 1:Check if the smart card is inserted properly in the Set Top Box (Hathway Logo upper side, chip on the lower side and arrow sign inside).
Step 2: Remove Smart card from the Set Top Box, clean with cotton/ soft dry cloth& re-insert again properly as guided above.
Step 3: Your issue should be resolved now. Enjoy Hathway services!
If you are still facing the same issue, you may contact your Area Supervisor or Local Service provider OR contact on our Helpline number from 6 AM to 12 midnight.

In case you are getting 'Technical problem' on your TV screen, you can follow the steps given below:
Step 1:Switch off your set top box from main power plug.
Step 2: Plug out the cable wires (Main Fiber cable & AV-TV wire) & wait for a few seconds.
Step 3: Reinsert cable wires.
Step 4: Switch on the set top box from power plug, wait for few seconds & then try to change the channel.
If you are still facing the same issue, you may contact your Area Supervisor or Local Service provider OR contact on our Helpline number from 6 AM to 12 midnight.

Once you enter your account details & proceed, your registered mobile number will be populated on the screen. If in case you do not have your registered mobile number, you can choose to update the same & verify your identity. 
Step 1: Click on 'Update' button displayed in mobile number field
Step 2: A message will be displayed “Please enter the code displayed on your TV linked with <VC/VSC/MAC/Acc..> to verify your details.” 
Step 3: Enter the code which is displayed on your TV screen
Step 4: Once the code is verified, OTP will be sent to new RMN. Enter the OTP received on your updated registered mobile number
Step 5: Your account details will be populated once you auntheticate via OTP. Click on 'Proceed' & you will get a confirmation "Hathway account linked successfully.	Tap below for more details

To link your hathway account to MyJio, you can follow the steps given below:
Step 1: Go to 'Link new account' & select 'Hathway'
Step 2: You can enter your account details i.e. Account number, VC ID, VSC ID OR MAC ID
Step 3: You will get a screen which shows your registered mobile number
Step 4: If in case you do not have your registered mobile number, you can choose to update the same & verify your identity. An OTP will be sent to your updated registered mobile number.
Step 5: Your account details will be populated once you auntheticate via OTP. Click on 'Proceed' & you will get a confirmation "Hathway account linked successfully"

response_message:
Possible reasons for 'No Internet Connection' are listed below. Please check your phone settings and correct as suggested:

1. Airplane mode is ON:
Switch off Airplane mode by clicking on Settings>disable Airplane Mode toggle button

2. Mobile data is OFF:
Switch on Mobile data by clicking on Settings>Mobile Data>enable Mobile Data toggle button

3. Data roaming is OFF:
Switch on Data Roaming by clicking on Settings>Mobile Data>Mobile Data Options> enable Data Roaming toggle button


In case settings in your phone are already aligned as per the above steps and you are still not able to connect to internet, restart your mobile and try connecting to internet again.

response_message:
Jio Home Gateway takes 3-4 minutes to stara. Green Stable LED indicates “Internet Connectivity established”. If you are facing issues while turning ON Jio Home Gateway you can try following Steps:
1.Check the Power Adaptor if it is properly connected to AC Power Socket. The other end of the cable should be firmly connected to Jio Home Gateway (Router).
2.Try to connect the Power Adaptor to a different power socket.
3. If still it doesn't turn ON, call our helpline 1800-896-9999

response_message:
You can retrieve PUK from IVR by dialling 199 from your Jio number. If you are using a non Jio number, please dial 1800-889-9999. Once you are on the IVR, kindly follow the below steps:
1. Select Language
2. After prompt choose option 6 for Jio tunes, PUK and report loss of SIM
3. After prompt choose option 2 for PUK
4. Enter Jio Number for which PUK required
5. You will then be prompted to enter the date of birth. After prompt enter Date of Birth of the account holder in the correct format.
6. The PUK will be read out to you.

2.Set P/T Mode to T 'Tone' Mode. This setting you will get behind the telephone Instrument.
3.Install JioCall app and set up landline number on your mobile. If its working on JioCall app, then you can try replacing with another RJ11 cable or another landline instrument.
After doing the above checks if your problem still persist, you can chat with our advisor. Tab below for further support.

buttons.title: Wi-Fi Calling Data Consumption Within India
Wi-Fi Calling Data Consumption Outside India

response_message: Wi-Fi calling consumes data from the Wi-Fi network you are connected to. Voice calling uses less than half MB of data per minute. The actual data usage of your voice or video calls may vary.

1. Voice calls will be consumed from your IR pack balance and do not consume data
2. Wi-Fi calling for Video calls consumes data from the home data plan balance
3. The actual data usage of your video call may vary
4. Wi-Fi calling for video calls is allowed only to Jio number in India.

2. Select 'Bookmarks'. Here you may edit the name of the bookmarked page on the browser and after that, tap on the ‘Add’ button to save it in the Bookmarks section.
3. To view the bookmarked web-pages in JioPages, go to the hamburger menu and tap on Bookmarks. All the bookmarked links would be seen listed there.

Incognito Browsing supports the following:
1. Prevents history, passwords and entries from being saved
2. Blocks cookies, temporary internet files and third-party tracking elements on web-pages you visit
3. Allows you to browse in the Incognito mode so that others using your phone can't see the pages you visit
To enable the Incognito mode, just tap on the hamburger menu, select the 'Incognito' icon and it’s done.

Interconnect Usage Charge or IUC is a cost paid by one mobile telecom operator to another, when its customers make outgoing mobile calls to the other operator’s customers. These calls between two different networks are known as mobile off-net calls. IUC charges were fixed by Telecom Regulatory Authority of India (TRAI) and were  at 6 paise per minute. However Jio assures that all Postpaid and Prepaid customers will not be charged 6 paise per min to call Non Jio Other Operator mobile numbers with effect from 1st January 2021.

To ensure our customers remain the beneficiary of every tariff & scheme, the top-up pack does not have any validity. That is, you can top-up your account and retain this balance till you want. This balance gets deducted only when you make ISD, Premium calls or SMS or any other relevant service.

Jio assures that all Postpaid and Prepaid customers will not be charged 6 paise per min to call Non Jio Other Operator mobile numbers with effect from 1st January 2021. All off-net and On-net domestic voice calls are free.

Jio Glass is based on mixed reality and is powered by both cellular and wireless networks using the paired phone and will let people join video conferences in a more streamlined and advanced way by holographically appearing in them, participants can also join video meetings via their regular video feed, showing a use case for mixed reality, which is a combination of Augmented Reality and Virtual Reality. The Jio Glass will be tethered using a mobile phone that can also be used to share files and presentations with participants. And there will be support for demonstrating presentations within Jio Glass as well. Jio Glass will be available in the market soon.
